contest-event.event-date:
March 22, 1952 D North West Area (Championship Section)
North West Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest North West Area north-west-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
North West
Championship
Resurgam
Victoria Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK CWS Manchester were originally awarded 1st prize, but were later disqualified under Rule 12 of contest rules - one cornet player had not been registered with the band far enough in advance of the contest date.
10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 2:53 a.m. March 15, 2018, 4:48 p.m.
